description:
3 Courses in One!
9 lectures over 4 hours of high-quality content.

If you have Photoshop CS3 or later, you will be able to do all the tricks shown in this three course bundle. Learn to:

  1. unlock the power of RAW images
  2. make people look "magazine" beautiful
  3. restore old photographs
  4. apply an easy High Dynamic Range workflow
  5. go a little bit crazy with dodge and burn tools
Photoshop Course 1 Module 1
  1. the basics of RAW images
  2. the secrets of workflow
  3. how to make images look professional
  4. why RAW is better than JPG
  5. the POWER of RAW images
  6. the Digital Negative Format
  7. how to use tools to move, crop and tweak
  8. how to use settings to enhance the original
  9. how to maximise the quality of your photos
  10. how to spot errors and how to avoid them
Photoshop Course 1 Module 2
  1. how to use layers
  2. how to use adjustment layer
  3. how to set levels
  4. how to set curves
  5. how to use the dropper tools
  6. how to use colour balance
  7. the black & white adjustment
  8. the POWER of layers
Photoshop Course 1 Module 3
  1. how to enhance areas of an image
  2. how to bring out details in the small areas
  3. how to balance out settings
  4. how to sharpen the image
  5. advanced fine tuning methods
  6. comparing the original to the modified version
Photoshop Course 2 Module 1
  1. how to enhance portraits
  2. how to smooth skin
  3. how to enhance eye colour
  4. how to increase detail and sharpness
Photoshop Course 2 Module 2
  1. how to brighten eyes
  2. how to enhance definition
  3. how to control region sharpening
Photoshop Course 2 Module 3
  1. how to change skin colour
  2. how to add a tan to skin
  3. how to add digital make-up
  4. how to do digital "plastic surgery"
  5. how to add gloss effects to skin
  6. varied techniques in portrait manipulation
Photoshop Course 3 Module 1
  1. what high dynamic range (HDR) means
  2. why HDR is awesome to use
  3. how to take photos for HDR
  4. how to combine images into HDR
  5. how to use PhotomatixPRO for easy HDR
  6. the different types of Tone Mapping
Photoshop Course 3 Module 2
  1. how to repair damaged photos
  2. how to remove noise
  3. how to bring back detail
  4. how to bring back colour
  5. how to bring back contrast
  6. how to fine tune small details
Photoshop Course 3 Module 3
  1. advanced import setting fixes
  2. how to use the dodge tool
  3. how to use the burn tool
  4. how to enhance highlights
  5. how to enhance shadows
  6. making a surreal image

With so much knowledge in an efficient 3 course, 9 lecture package this will be the best 4 hours of Photoshop Secrets you have ever invested in. Normally sold separately for $25 each course you can have lifetime access to all three courses via Udemy for only $25. What are you waiting for?
title: Photoshop Secrets for Absolute Beginners
